bug.author: leemgs
bug.summary: [NNStreamer/Apptest] It seems that apptest is not still stable.
bug.description:
As we all know, We have enabled a virtual camera based NNStreamer's application tests whenever a PR is submitted in real time as a runt test. Now, Fortunately, the basic operations of apptest is normally running in AWS Ubuntu instance (16.04, without Amazon Custom Linux kernel). But, a failure issue of apptest has been reported by developers. From now on, We need to stabilize the existing apptest. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Action items (Open for Participation):</denchmark-h>
It seems that the log messages of apptest is not enough. nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#432
Fix broken message in the output file (e.g., mobilenet_v1_1.0_224_quant.tflite, labels.txt) nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#440 Append helpful messages in the output file. Display what are applications evaluated in the output file
Improve readability for maintenance Can we append the more functionalities into the apptest facility? Is the run test is really correct?
Fixed with workaround by disabling broken test apps. nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#434 Fixed GUI app test with Xvnc + fake USB camera (/dev/video0). nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#437 Re-enable broken test applications nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#438
Stabilize the all functions
/dev/video0 (fake camera device) with generic Linux kernel version instead of AWS custom kernel. Virtual Network Computing (VNC) for a graphical desktop sharing system. nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#442 nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#443 #531 libv4l2: error getting pixformat: Invalid argument (frequency: sometimes)
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>File name</denchmark-h>
https://github.com/nnsuite/TAOS-CI/blob/master/ci/taos/plugins-staging/pr-audit-nnstreamer-ubuntu-apptest.sh
<denchmark-h:h3>Log message of ./report/nnstreamer-apptest-output.log</denchmark-h>
nnstreamer-apptest-output.log
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82404/49227315-2158b480-f42c-11e8-880e-2bf720eba1bc.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>CI failure: log message</denchmark-h>
[DEBUG] Starting 'gst-launch-1.0 v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! videoconvert ! ximagesink' test for VNC envronment... Setting pipeline to PAUSED ... MobaXterm X11 proxy: Unsupported authorisation protocol ERROR: Pipeline doesn't want to pause. ERROR: from element /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstXImageSink:ximagesink0: Could not initialise X output Additional debug info: ximagesink.c(863): gst_x_image_sink_xcontext_get (): /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstXImageSink:ximagesink0: Could not open display Setting pipeline to NULL ... Freeing pipeline ...

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/905>#905</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jaeyun-jung>@jaeyun-jung</denchmark-link> PTAL, I have updated the existing wiki page as follows in order to synchronize the script file and the wiki page if we need. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82404/49132641-74454580-f320-11e8-9be9-50400472ab2b.png></denchmark-link>

<denchmark-h:h3>How to check Pixel Format</denchmark-h>
Fake camera
invain@mymate:~$ invain@mymate:~$ v4l2-ctl -d /dev/video0 --list-formats ioctl: VIDIOC_ENUM_FMT Index : 0 Type : Video Capture Pixel Format: 'YUYV' Name : YUYV 4:2:2
invain@mymate:~$ invain@mymate:~$ lsmod | grep v4l2loop v4l2loopback 40960 2 videodev 180224 3 v4l2loopback invain@mymate:~$
Real camera (with Logitech ) by @jaeyun-jung $ v4l2-ctl --all -d /dev/video0 --list-formats
<denchmark-code>Driver Info (not using libv4l2): Driver name : uvcvideo Card type : HD Pro Webcam C920 Bus info : usb-0000:00:14.0-6 Driver version: 4.15.18 Capabilities : 0x84200001 Video Capture Streaming Extended Pix Format Device Capabilities Device Caps : 0x04200001 Video Capture Streaming Extended Pix Format Priority: 2 Video input : 0 (Camera 1: ok) Format Video Capture: Width/Height : 2304/1536 Pixel Format : 'YUYV' Field : None Bytes per Line : 4608 Size Image : 7077888 Colorspace : sRGB Transfer Function : Default YCbCr Encoding : Default Quantization : Default Flags : Crop Capability Video Capture: Bounds : Left 0, Top 0, Width 2304, Height 1536 Default : Left 0, Top 0, Width 2304, Height 1536 Pixel Aspect: 1/1 Selection: crop_default, Left 0, Top 0, Width 2304, Height 1536 Selection: crop_bounds, Left 0, Top 0, Width 2304, Height 1536 Streaming Parameters Video Capture: Capabilities : timeperframe Frames per second: 2.000 (2/1) Read buffers : 0 brightness (int) : min=0 max=255 step=1 default=128 value=128 contrast (int) : min=0 max=255 step=1 default=128 value=128 saturation (int) : min=0 max=255 step=1 default=128 value=128 white_balance_temperature_auto (bool) : default=1 value=1 gain (int) : min=0 max=255 step=1 default=0 value=0 power_line_frequency (menu) : min=0 max=2 default=2 value=2 white_balance_temperature (int) : min=2000 max=6500 step=1 default=4000 value=3044 flags=inactive sharpness (int) : min=0 max=255 step=1 default=128 value=128 backlight_compensation (int) : min=0 max=1 step=1 default=0 value=0 exposure_auto (menu) : min=0 max=3 default=3 value=3 exposure_absolute (int) : min=3 max=2047 step=1 default=250 value=166 flags=inactive exposure_auto_priority (bool) : default=0 value=1 pan_absolute (int) : min=-36000 max=36000 step=3600 default=0 value=0 tilt_absolute (int) : min=-36000 max=36000 step=3600 default=0 value=0 focus_absolute (int) : min=0 max=250 step=5 default=0 value=30 flags=inactive focus_auto (bool) : default=1 value=1 zoom_absolute (int) : min=100 max=500 step=1 default=100 value=100 ioctl: VIDIOC_ENUM_FMT Index : 0 Type : Video Capture Pixel Format: 'YUYV' Name : YUYV 4:2:2
Index : 1 Type : Video Capture Pixel Format: 'H264' (compressed) Name : H.264
Index : 2 Type : Video Capture Pixel Format: 'MJPG' (compressed) Name : Motion-JPEG </denchmark-code>

<denchmark-h:h4>gstreamer: producer</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>$ ffmpeg -f x11grab -r 15 -s 1280x720 -i :0.0+0,0 -vcodec rawvideo -pix_fmt yuv420p -threads 0 -f v4l2 /dev/video0
$ gst-launch-1.0 videotestsrc ! v4l2sink device=/dev/video0
$ wget http://file-examples.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/file_example_MP4_640_3MG.mp4 $ gst-launch-1.0 filesrc location=./file_example_MP4_640_3MG.mp4 ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! v4l2sink device=/dev/video0
$ wget http://file-examples.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/file_example_MP4_640_3MG.mp4 $ gst-launch-1.0 multiplefilesrc location=./file_example_MP4_640_3MG.mp4 loop=true ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! v4l2sink device=/dev/video0 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h4>gstreamer: consumer</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>$ gst-launch-1.0 v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! xvimagesink
$ gst-launch-1.0 v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! videoconvert ! ximagesink (for Remote VNC)
$ ./nnstreamer_example_filter </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Unit test: Failed</denchmark-h>
1. Producer: Xvnc :19 & export DISPLAY=0.0:19 gst-launch-1.0 videotestsrc ! v4l2sink device=/dev/video0 &
2. Consumer: export DISPLAY=0.0:19 gst-launch-1.0 v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! videoconvert ! ximagesink

<denchmark-h:h4>Test scenario ( on nnsuite.mooo.com server)</denchmark-h>
Xvnc :23 & export DISPLAY=0.0:23 gst-launch-1.0 videotestsrc ! v4l2sink device=/dev/video0 &
export DISPLAY=0.0:23 gst-launch-1.0 v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! videoconvert ! ximagesink <denchmark-h:h3>Failure case: Device or resource busy</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code> www-data@ip-172-31-27-164:~$ sudo gst-launch-1.0 v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! videoconvert ! ximagesink Setting pipeline to PAUSED ... ERROR: Pipeline doesn't want to pause. ERROR: from element /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstV4l2Src:v4l2src0: Could not open device '/dev/video0' for reading and writing. Additional debug info: v4l2_calls.c(620): gst_v4l2_open (): /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstV4l2Src:v4l2src0: system error: Device or resource busy Setting pipeline to NULL ... Freeing pipeline ... www-data@ip-172-31-27-164:~$
</denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Failure case: Internal data flow error.</denchmark-h>
Case: When a producer is not running, Case: When Xvnc is not running,
<denchmark-code> gst-launch-1.0 v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! videoconvert ! ximagesink Setting pipeline to PAUSED ... libv4l2: error getting pixformat: Invalid argument <== HERE!!!! Pipeline is live and does not need PREROLL ... Setting pipeline to PLAYING ... ERROR: from element /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstV4l2Src:v4l2src0: Internal data flow error. <== HERE!!!! Additional debug info: gstbasesrc.c(2948): gst_base_src_loop (): /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstV4l2Src:v4l2src0: streaming task paused, reason not-negotiated (-4) Execution ended after 0:00:00.000057413 Setting pipeline to PAUSED ... Setting pipeline to READY ... Setting pipeline to NULL ... Freeing pipeline ... www-data@ip-172-31-27-164:~/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI$ www-data@ip-172-31-27-164:~/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI$
</denchmark-code>

[3] 90424 www-data@ip-172-31-27-164:~$ Setting pipeline to PAUSED ... libv4l2: error getting pixformat: Invalid format Pipeline is PREROLLING ... Pipeline is PREROLLED ... Setting pipeline to PLAYING ... New clock: GstSystemClock
</denchmark-code>

__do_page_fault+0x1c1/0x410 [ 5782.729394] [<ffffffff8122c019>] SyS_ioctl+0x79/0x90 [ 5782.729397] [<ffffffff818576ce>] entry_SYSCALL_64_fastpath+0x22/0xc1 [ 5782.729398] ---[ end trace 6c8d4a729832de84 ]---
</denchmark-code>

<denchmark-code> [DEBUG] Starting nnstreamer_example_filter test... nnapi error: unable to open library libneuralnetworks.so MobaXterm X11 proxy: Unsupported authorisation protocol ERROR: from element /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstXImageSink:img_tensor: Could not initialise X output Additional debug info: ximagesink.c(863): gst_x_image_sink_xcontext_get (): /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstXImageSink:img_tensor: Could not open display MobaXterm X11 proxy: Unsupported authorisation protocol

[DEBUG] Starting nnstreamer_example_cam test... MobaXterm X11 proxy: Unsupported authorisation protocol ERROR: from element /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstXImageSink:img_origin: Could not initialise X output Additional debug info: ximagesink.c(863): gst_x_image_sink_xcontext_get (): /GstPipeline:pipeline0/GstXImageSink:img_origin: Could not open display MobaXterm X11 proxy: Unsupported authorisation protocol

MobaXterm X11 proxy: Unsupported authorisation protocol ERROR: from element /GstPipeline:pipeline1/GstXImageSink:ximagesink0: Could not initialise X output Additional debug info: ximagesink.c(863): gst_x_image_sink_xcontext_get (): /GstPipeline:pipeline1/GstXImageSink:ximagesink0: Could not open display ``
</denchmark-code>

<denchmark-h:h2>Sub issue: It seems that the output log does not give developer helpful information.</denchmark-h>
Screenshot:

<denchmark-h:h3>Analysis: Comparison an environment setting of 'www-data' between console account and Apache account.</denchmark-h>
The console account:
<denchmark-code>www-data@ip-172-31-27-164:~/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/taos/plugins-staging$ env SHELL=/bin/bash TERM=xterm GTK_MODULES=gail:atk-bridge USER=www-data MAIL=/var/mail/www-data PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/local/games:/usr/games QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME=appmenu-qt5 PWD=/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/taos/plugins-staging LANG=ko_KR.UTF-8 SHLVL=1 HOME=/var/www LANGUAGE=ko_KR:ko:en_US:en LOGNAME=www-data DISPLAY=localhost:10.0 <================ HERE!!! _=/usr/bin/env OLDPWD=/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/taos You have new mail in /var/mail/www-data </denchmark-code>
The Apache account.
DEBUG] The producer (pid: 125949) is successfully started. APACHE_PID_FILE=/var/run/apache2/apache2.pid APACHE_RUN_USER=www-data dir_ci=/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci OLDPWD=/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/926-201811290931110.20327305793762-d31d618504085308a886d43c48006b5c525f5d1a/nnstreamer/bin/tflite_model LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 LD_LIBRARY_PATH=:/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/926-201811290931110.20327305793762-d31d618504085308a886d43c48006b5c525f5d1a/nnstreamer/lib dir_worker=repo-workers/pr-checker dir_commit=repo-workers/pr-checker/926-201811290931110.20327305793762-d31d618504085308a886d43c48006b5c525f5d1a PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games APACHE_LOG_DIR=/var/log/apache2 PWD=/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/926-201811290931110.20327305793762-d31d618504085308a886d43c48006b5c525f5d1a/nnstreamer/bin LANG=en_US.UTF-8 APACHE_RUN_GROUP=www-data SHLVL=2 LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 NNST_ROOT=/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/926-201811290931110.20327305793762-d31d618504085308a886d43c48006b5c525f5d1a/nnstreamer GST_PLUGIN_PATH=:/var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/926-201811290931110.20327305793762-d31d618504085308a886d43c48006b5c525f5d1a/nnstreamer/lib/gstreamer-1.0 DISPLAY=0.0:11 <================ HERE!!! APACHE_RUN_DIR=/var/run/apache2 APACHE_LOCK_DIR=/var/lock/apache2 _=/usr/bin/env Setting pipeline to PAUSED ... Pipeline is PREROLLING ... Pipeline is PREROLLED ... Setting pipeline to PLAYING ...
To All, Welcome to any hints and comment to fix this issue.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jijoongmoon>@jijoongmoon</denchmark-link> Please post the log messages that you have experienced while running the nnstreamer/apptest here. I expect that you will not those issues after the PRs above. :)
